headline: Baker Hughes (BKR) Up 13.1% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Continue?
summary: Baker Hughes (BKR) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

headline: Cboe Global Markets and General Mills have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
summary: Cboe Global Markets surges on record EPS and revenue, crushing Mag 7, while General Mills sinks on weak sales and margin pressure.

headline: Halliburton Teams Up With Pertamina to Boost Indonesia's Energy Output
summary: HAL partners with Pertamina to deploy advanced drilling, AI and automation to revive Indonesia's aging oil fields and boost output.

raw.headline: Halliburton Teams Up With Pertamina to Boost Indonesia's Energy Output
raw.summary: HAL partners with Pertamina to deploy advanced drilling, AI and automation to revive Indonesia's aging oil fields and boost output.

headline: How Halliburton’s AI-Enabled Indonesia Fracturing Pact with Pertamina Could Impact Halliburton (HAL) Investors
summary: In February 2026, PT Pertamina (Persero) announced it had signed a memorandum of understanding with Halliburton to accelerate advanced well construction and stimulation technologies in Indonesia, including multi-stage hydraulic fracturing, acid stimulation, advanced cementing, and potential closed-loop automation and artificial intelligence applications in selected onshore fields. This collaboration highlights Halliburton’s push to widen its unconventional completions presence in Southeast...
